ygData.subject: Re: to Korm
ygData.msgSnippet: freeport is somewhat different from other cities in that evil folk CAN enter most of it if you spend time gaining faction. this is because of the fact that the
ygData.messageBody:
freeport is somewhat different from other cities in that evil folk CAN enter
most of it if you spend time gaining faction. this is because of the fact
that the guards in n freeport are paladins, and the guards in w and e
freeport are militia, and the two groups hate each other. so kill enough of
one, and the other will allow you in. this means that if a troll were to
sneak into n freeport via the drainage system and kill enough guards there,
he could safely walk the streets in the rest of town! but like i said, this
seems to be an exception; i have found NOTHING that increases my faction
with either grobb or oggok, so i fear that as a human sk i will never be
allowed into these two cities :(

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
